channel.title: Gamma 718 - Jump into the Patriam
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction[/b] [i]Welcome to Gamma 718. Gamma 718 is a project that is based on the 718 Revision of RuneScape. Gamma 718 will only use all content from the 718 Revision and that revision only. It has a 718 Cache and all Definitions are for the 718 Cache so the whole project is 718 based. Our aim for this server is to have a fun, active player base who are friendly and outgoing. The server is aiming to be a big, successful server with 2 worlds. One world based on PvM and Skilling, and the other main world which is based on PvPing.[/i]
[b]Links[/b] [i][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/32zdh9z9bo07e2f/Gamma718.jar]Download Gamma 718![/i] [i]Website (Link added once created).[/i] [i]Forums (Link added once created).[/i] [i]Vote (Link added once created).[/i] [i]High Scores (Link added once created).[/i]
[b]Developers[/b] [i][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560587]Skyro[/url][/i] [i][url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/detox/]Detox[/url][/i]
[b]Change log[/b] [code] Version 1.0 (29-06-2013). - Connected the Server and Client. - Configured a base Settings. - Removed some Controllers. - Change the Home Location.
Version 1.1 (29-06-2013). - Added Charm Drops. - Added Ring of Wealth Drops. - Added Rare Drops Yell to Server.
Version 1.2 (29-06-2013). - Fixed the Client Background. - Added Donator Symbols. - Change the Client Loader.
Version 1.3 (3-07-2013). - Added and Changed some Commands.
Version 1.4 (8-07-2013). - Removed a lot of useless content, added a few pking type commands. [/code]
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ei4j00.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kHzoeufaSx0[/youtube] [/center]

item.title: Gamma 718 - Jump into the Patriam
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

[center]Introduction
Welcome to Gamma 718. Gamma 718 is a project that is based on the 718 Revision of RuneScape. Gamma 718 will only use all content from the 718 Revision and that revision only. It has a 718 Cache and all Definitions are for the 718 Cache so the whole project is 718 based. Our aim for this server is to have a fun, active player base who are friendly and outgoing. The server is aiming to be a big, successful server with 2 worlds. One world based on PvM and Skilling, and the other main world which is based on PvPing.

- Configured a base Settings.
- Removed some Controllers.

- Added Rare Drops Yell to Server.

Version 1.2 (29-06-2013).
- Fixed the Client Background.
- Added Donator Symbols.
- Change the Client Loader.

Version 1.3 (3-07-2013).
